name: Zen Garden Builder
description: A relaxing sandbox game where players create their own Japanese zen garden with rocks, plants, water features, and sand rake patterns. Features harmony scoring system based on element balance.
author: Game Developer

files.index.html: Main HTML structure with tool palette

features: 8 different garden elements (rake, rocks, plants, trees, water, bridges, lanterns, cherry blossoms)
Harmony scoring system based on element balance
Canvas-based drawing with custom element rendering
Zen wisdom quotes that change periodically
Responsive canvas that scales with window

controls.place_element: Click on canvas to place selected element
controls.clear: Clear Garden button removes all elements
controls.save: Save Design button downloads canvas as PNG

gameplay.harmony_calculation: Balance of rocks (30-40%), plants (20-30%), and water (10-20%) plus rake patterns
gameplay.ideal_garden: Mix different elements thoughtfully for maximum harmony score

technology.canvas: HTML5 Canvas API for custom rendering
technology.fonts: Google Fonts (Noto Serif JP, Crimson Text)
technology.rendering: Custom shape drawing functions for each element type
